cast.overview: After receiving an exotic small animal as a Christmas gift, a young man inadvertently breaks three important rules concerning his new pet, which unleashes a horde of malevolently mischievous creatures on a small town.
cast.title: Gremlins

details.biography:
​From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia

Michael Winslow (born September 6, 1958) is an American actor and a comedian known as the "Man of 10,000 Sound Effects" for his ability to make realistic sound effects using only his voice. He lives in Winter Springs, Florida, an outlying suburb of Orlando.

Description above from the Wikipedia article Michael Winslow, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
details.name: Michael Winslow
